name: The Marketplace Coalition
goal: To communicate with the European Institutions, the actions taken and the views held by the Marketplace Coalition's members on issues that impact online e-commerce marketplaces which empower small sellers to reach global markets.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: E-commerce Directive, MoU, and anti-counterfeiting, Product Safety, VAT, Digital Taxation and anti-money laundering, Marketplace Liability, Illegal Content.
